title: Coronavirus: Businesses adapting to life under lockdown
description: UK companies tell the BBC how they have changed in order to survive the coronavirus lockdown.
content:
Image copyrightAndrei LussmannImage caption
 Andrei Lussmann owns a chain of six restaurants across the south of England
"A restaurant kitchen is completely different from a production kitchen, and we had never delivered a unit of food," Andrei Lussmann say… [+7371 chars]
